alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 08 at 7:21PM MST until March 10 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations generally ranging from 3 to 7 inches with a localized band of 8 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Platte, Goshen, and Laramie Counties including the cities of Wheatland, Torrington, Cheyenne, and Pine Bluffs. The heaviest snow is expected near the central Laramie Range including Wheatland and Chugwater, southeastward along the Goshen and Laramie County line. * WHEN...5 PM MST this afternoon until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
